mapper.update: update gdaws_aq_sync_config set LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_START = #{lastNewPullStart}, LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_END = #{lastNewPullEnd}, where SITE_ID = localSiteId and GROUP_ID localParamId
mapper.sql: SELECT conf.SITE_ID localSiteId, site.NWIS_SITE_NO remoteSiteId, grp.PARM_CD pCode, grp.GROUP_ID localParamId, conf.LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_START lastNewPullStart, conf.LAST_NEW_DATA_PULL_END lastNewPullEnd FROM gdaws_aq_sync_config conf INNER JOIN site_star site ON conf.site_id = site.site_id INNER JOIN group_name grp ON grp.group_id = conf.group_id ORDER BY conf.SITE_ID, conf.GROUP_ID
